Which of the following authors protested socioeconomic inequality during the Baroque era?
How did Baroque art differ from previous Renaissance works?
questions.a: Baroque art was more dramatic and emotional.
questions.b: Baroque art became more simplified in style and composition.
questions.c: Baroque art shifted away from religious themes.
questions.d: Baroque art drew greater inspiration from classical antiquity.
questions.e: Baroque art relied heavily on abstract and non-representational forms.

questions.question: Which Baroque painter is BEST known for his dramatic use of light and dark?

In which medium did Gianlorenzo Bernini complete his most significant works?
Why was Rembrandt’s group portrait The Night Watch controversial?
questions.a: He portrayed some individuals in an unflattering manner.
questions.b: He used unconventional colors that deviated from traditional palettes.
questions.c: He included hidden political messages that offended some viewers.
questions.d: He focused more on certain members of the group than others.
questions.e: He depicted the scene in a historically inaccurate setting.

questions.question: Which ruler established an annual exhibition known as the Academy?
What technique did Diego Velázquez use to create his paintings?
questions.a: using grids to achieve accurate proportions and perspective
questions.b: building figures from patches of color rather than a rough sketch
questions.c: layering thin glazes to create rich colors and build subtle contrasts
questions.d: applying thick impasto layers to add texture and depth
questions.e: using fine, detailed brushstrokes to create realistic textures

questions.question: Which of the following colors did Rococo artists MOST often emphasize in their works?

Whose art MOST strongly influenced Jean-Honoré Fragonard’s works?

Which of the following statements BEST describes a similarity between Romanticism and an earlier movement?
questions.a: Romantic and Rococo art celebrated the beauty of natural landscapes.
questions.b: Romantic and Classical art appealed to a sense of harmony and balance.
questions.c: Romantic and Baroque art emphasized heightened emotions.
questions.d: Renaissance and Renaissance art focused on human individuality and self-expression.
questions.e: Baroque and Gothic art highlighted the mysterious and the supernatural.
